---
title: "Top ten words in the brief titles of clinicaltrials.gov for studies in women only and men only"
output: pdf_document
---
  
```{r, include=FALSE}
### run from 98_word_frequency.R

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, error=FALSE, comment='', dpi=400)
options(width=1000) # Wide pages
options(scipen=999) # avoid scientific presentation

library(flextable)
```


```{r}
ftab = select(freqs, gender, word, freq) %>%
  rename('Count' = 'freq') %>%
  flextable() %>%
  merge_v(j=1) %>%
  theme_box() %>%
  autofit()
ftab
```

Stop words were removed and all text converted to lower case.
